title: Drawing, "Carter Dome from Carter Lake, New Hampshire", ca. 1880
medium: Point of brush and black ink, watercolor, gouache, graphite touches on cream wove paper
signed: Trimmed signature in brush and brown ink, lower left: [W]  L. Sonntag
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right verso:  No. 7 llll; in another hand: for Minneapolis (sic) ex./Carter Dome from Carter Lanke/Wm L. Sonntag N.A./120 East 22 St-/New York Ci.../[unreadable numbers]
creditline: Gift of William H. Matthews from the Estate of Frederick A. Moore
description: A bright winter landscape at sunrise or sunset.  A lake inlet in center foreground with low rocks at lower right and windswept rocks, brush and trees in left foreground into middleground.  Looming over the lake, in right middleground, a large ball-shaped mountain with remnants of snow a crevice.  An orange, yellow, and blue sky fills the upper left quarter of the sheet.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Carter Dome from Carter Lake, New Hampshire", ca. 1880. Point of brush and black ink, watercolor, gouache, graphite touches on cream wove paper. Gift of William H. Matthews from the Estate of Frederick A. Moore. 1956-183-1.
